abstract: Palbociclib, a drug being developed by Pfizer, sharply cut the risk that advanced cancer would worsen among patients taking part in a Phase 2 study, researchers said.
snippet: Palbociclib, a drug being developed by Pfizer, sharply cut the risk that advanced cancer would worsen among patients taking part in a Phase 2 study, researchers said.
lead_paragraph: SAN DIEGO — Researchers say that a new type of drug can help prevent advanced breast cancer from worsening, potentially providing an important new treatment option for women and a blockbuster product for Pfizer.

headline.main: Guarded Optimism After Breast Cancer Drug Shows Promising Results
headline.print_headline: Guarded Optimism After Breast Cancer Drug Shows Promising Results
